sn_tools.sn_rate module¶

class sn_tools.sn_rate.SN_Rate(rate='Ripoche', H0=70, Om0=0.25, min_rf_phase=-15.0, max_rf_phase=30.0)¶

Bases: object

class SNRate Estimate production rates of typeIa SN Available rates: Ripoche, Perrett,Dilday
